elementlist.def: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan), abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing, surname Ba, abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian, abbr. for Pakistan :: to long for, to wish, to cling to, to stick to, sth that sticks, close to, next to, spread open, informal abbr. for bus %u5DF4%u58EB, bar (unit of pressure), nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as %u5C3E%u5DF4, tail
